files.content:
<script lang="ts">
	import { AlertDialog as AlertDialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";

	interface Props extends AlertDialogPrimitive.RootProps {}

	let { ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<AlertDialogPrimitive.Root {...rest}>
	{@render rest.children?.()}
</AlertDialogPrimitive.Root>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { AlertDialog as AlertDialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends AlertDialogPrimitive.TriggerProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<AlertDialogPrimitive.Trigger class={cn(className)} {...rest}>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</AlertDialogPrimitive.Trigger>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { AlertDialog as AlertDialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends AlertDialogPrimitive.ContentProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<AlertDialogPrimitive.Portal>
	<AlertDialogPrimitive.Overlay
		class="fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-sm data-[state=open]:animate-fade-in data-[state=closed]:animate-fade-out"
	/>
	<AlertDialogPrimitive.Content
		class={cn(
			"fixed left-1/2 top-1/2 z-50 w-full max-w-lg -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 glass-heavy rounded-2xl p-6 shadow-glass-xl data-[state=open]:animate-glass-in data-[state=closed]:animate-glass-out",
			className
		)}
		{...rest}
	>
		{#if children}
			{@render children()}
		{/if}
	</AlertDialogPrimitive.Content>
</AlertDialogPrimitive.Portal>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { AlertDialog as AlertDialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends AlertDialogPrimitive.TitleProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<AlertDialogPrimitive.Title class={cn("text-lg font-semibold", className)} {...rest}>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</AlertDialogPrimitive.Title>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { AlertDialog as AlertDialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends AlertDialogPrimitive.DescriptionProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<AlertDialogPrimitive.Description class={cn("text-sm text-muted-foreground", className)} {...rest}>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</AlertDialogPrimitive.Description>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { AlertDialog as AlertDialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends AlertDialogPrimitive.ActionProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<AlertDialogPrimitive.Action
	class={cn(
		"inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-lg text-sm font-medium h-10 px-4 py-2 bg-primary text-primary-foreground shadow-glass hover:opacity-90 transition-all duration-200 active:scale-[0.98] cursor-pointer",
		className
	)}
	{...rest}
>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</AlertDialogPrimitive.Action>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { AlertDialog as AlertDialogPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends AlertDialogPrimitive.CancelProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<AlertDialogPrimitive.Cancel
	class={cn(
		"inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-lg text-sm font-medium h-10 px-4 py-2 glass hover:shadow-glass transition-all duration-200 active:scale-[0.98] cursor-pointer",
		className
	)}
	{...rest}
>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</AlertDialogPrimitive.Cancel>
